item.title: htmz - a low power tool for html
item.description: How does it work? htmz is an iframe named "htmz". You invoke htmz by loading a URL into the iframe via target=htmz. By using an iframe, we lean on the browser’s native capability to fetch the URL and parse the HTML. After loading the HTML resource, we take the resulting DOM via an onload handler.
